summary: This is a Victim Notification System (VNS) email from the U.S. Department of Justice, Southern District of New York, notifying a victim or potential victim (identified by the last name 'Jackson') about an upcoming status hearing in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell. The hearing is scheduled for November 1, 2021, before Judge Alison Nathan.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case for which this victim notification is being sent. A status hearing is scheduled for her case.

persons.name: Alison Nathan
persons.context: The judge before whom the status hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell's case is scheduled.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney whose office is sending the victim notification. She is listed as the signatory of the letter.

persons.name: Jackson
persons.context: The recipient of the notification, identified by the last name 'Jackson' as a victim or potential victim in the investigation of Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Jackson is identified as a victim or potential victim during the investigation of the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
Audrey Strauss, as United States Attorney, is prosecuting the criminal case against defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Judge Alison Nathan is presiding over the scheduled status hearing in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Status Hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A status hearing is scheduled before Judge Alison Nathan to determine if there are issues the court needs to address and to schedule future court dates in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: VNS Notification Sent
events.description: The U.S. Department of Justice Victim Notification System sends an email notification to a victim/potential victim about the upcoming status hearing.

locations: Southern District of New York, One St. Andrews Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Clerk's Office, 500 Pearl Street, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A victim or potential victim in the Ghislaine Maxwell case is identified by the last name 'Jackson'.
A status hearing for Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal case (20-CR-00330) is scheduled for November 1, 2021, before Judge Alison Nathan.
The notification is sent via the DOJ's Victim Notification System (VNS), indicating the case is proceeding through the criminal justice system with victim/witness coordination.
The investigative case number referenced is 31E-NY-3027571, and the court docket number is 20-CR-00330.
The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time was Audrey Strauss.
